Sentencas: Electrochemical energy devices offer a variety of alternate means for low-carbon, multi-scale energy conversion and storage.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: Reactions in these devices are supported by electrodes with characteristically complex microstructures.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: To meet the increasing capacity and lifetime demands across a range of applications, it is essential to understand microstructural evolutions at a cell and electrode level which are thought to be critical aspects influencing material and device lifetime and performance.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: X-ray computed tomography (CT) has become a highly employed method for non-destructive characterisation of such microstructures with high spatial resolution.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: However, sub-micron resolutions present significant challenges for sample preparation and handling particularly in 4D studies, (three spatial dimensions plus time).
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: Here, microstructural information is collected from the same region of interest within two electrode materials: a solid oxide fuel cell and the positive electrode from a lithium-ion battery.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: Using a lab-based X-ray instrument, tomograms with sub-micron resolutions were obtained between thermal cycling.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: The intricate microstructural evolutions captured within these two materials provide model examples of 4D X-ray nano-CT capabilities in tracking challenging degradation mechanisms.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging

Sentencas: This technique is valuable in the advancement of electrochemical research as well as broader applications for materials characterisation.
Titulo: 4D nano-tomography of electrochemical energy devices using lab-based X-ray imaging
